question: Do you have any health problems that require you to limit movement and activity?
Do you suffer from any of the following health conditions?
Do you take any immunosupressants taken after transplant (e.g. steroids, methotrexate, other)?
Do you regularly take Nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) taken for inflammation associated conditions such as arthritis, tendonitis, and bursitis etc. (e.g. ibuprofen, naproxen, other)?
Do you regularly take blood pressure medications (e.g. enapril, ramipril, other)?
Do you have any health conditions that restrict you from staying at home?
Do you use a stick, wheelchair or other assistive devices?
How many people in your family or apartment?
Do you think you already had COVID-19, but were not tested?
Have you or anyone in your family travelled abroad in last 14 days?
If yes which country (China, Italy, Spain, UK, USA, Middle East, East Asia, Other)
Have you or someone in your family been in close contact with a confirmed COVID-19 patient within last 14 days?
Have you or someone in your family been in close contact with someone having cough, cold, fever and shortness of breathe within last 14 days?
